name: Disco Lives
description:
The year in 1987. People say disco is dead, but you know better - time to go out to the clubs and prove them wrong.

With your sweet dance moves, and some bottles of Spanish wine, turn the whole world into disco freaks!

How to play

The world is full of dorks and punks. Time to turn them on to the power of disco!

Dance around the dorks to turn them into disco freaks, and turn the punks into dorks (gotta start somewhere!) by throwing them some good wine. Once everyone in a club has been turned on, on to the next one!

But beware: the dorks and punks are also looking to make converts, with their boring classical records and broken bottles of cheap whiskey.

You only have so much Disco Power to keep you going. When you're running low, grab a drink from the bar to recharge.

Controls

Disco Lives supports keyboard and controllers.

Keyboard
  • WASD / arrow keys: Move
  • LShift: Dance
  • Space: Throw wine
Controller
  • Left stick: Move
  • A: Dance
  • B: Throw wine

(Controller mapping is for XBox controller - others may vary)
